## Menu.addItem() method

Adds a menu item. Only works when menu is not shown yet.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addItem(cb: (item: MenuItem) => any): this;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cb | (item: [MenuItem](./obsidian.menuitem.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; any |  |
